en.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.ROOM_DESTROYED:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_LOBBY_TIMEOUT:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly. (Cause: 1)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_JOIN_TIMEOUT:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly. (Cause: 2)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_GAME_TIMEOUT:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly. (Cause: 3)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_DISCONNECT:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly. (Cause: 4)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_BY_REQUEST:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly. (Cause: 5)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_SHUTTING_DOWN:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly. (Cause: 6)
en.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: We're sorry, we've lost your connection to the Jackbox Games servers.
en.TIMEOUT:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.USER_DISCONNECT: We're sorry, the server has disconnected you. Please try again.
en.LOST_LICENSE: We're sorry, we lost the license for this content!
en.STEAM_ERROR: We're sorry, we couldn't validate your Steam license.
en.TWITCH_PRIME_ERROR: We're sorry, we couldn't validate your Twitch Prime license.
en.LOST_DLC: We're sorry, the license for your DLC could not be found. Returning you to the menu...
en.CONNECTING_DELAY:
C'est anormalement long...
Vérifiez votre connextion internet.
en.EVERYBODYS_IN: En attente de %s pour commencer la partie !
en.WAITING_FOR_MORE: En attente de %s joueurs pour commencer !
en.LOBBY_STATUS_MESSAGE_CANSTART: Appuyez quand tout le monde est prêt
en.LOBBY_STATUS_MESSAGE_WAITINGFORVIP: En attente de {VIP} pour commencer la partie !
en.LOBBY_STATUS_MESSAGE_WAITINGFORGAMEPAD: En attente du démarrage du jeu !
en.WRITING_INSTRUCTION_TEXT: Entrez votre réponse. Écrivez au minimum %d+ mots.
en.WRITING_ERROR_TEXT: les réponses doivent contenir %s mots minimum
en.CREATING_DONE_TEXT: Merci ! Votre réponse a bien été reçue.
en.CREATING_INSTRUCTION_TEXT: Tapez ou faites glissez des mots ici. Je crois en vous !
en.AUDIENCE_PHOTO_PROMPT: Votez pour une photo pour le prochain poster
en.AUDIENCE_WORD_PROMPT: Tapez ou faites glisser un mot pour remplir la description du prochain poster
en.AUDIENCE_DONE_MESSAGE: Votre vote a été enregistré ! Le poster final apparaîtra sur l'écran bientôt !
en.HOST_JOKE_SMALL_TALK: Employees have to be able to engage in small talk.
en.HOST_JOKE_CHITCHAT: If you're no good at chitchat, you're no good to me.
en.HOST_JOKE_GOSSIP: I rely on you for juicy office gossip.
en.HOST_JOKE_MORE_TALK: The more you talk, the smarter you are.
en.TD_VOTE_WINNER: The winning answer is "%s" by %s with %d percent of the vote.
en.CREDITS_THEME_0: Life is short but the days are long
en.CREDITS_THEME_1: Never thought you’d be feeling so blue
en.CREDITS_THEME_2: Stuck at home with the TV on
en.CREDITS_THEME_4: Somewhere where you can be the you that you know you can be
en.CREDITS_THEME_5: Somewhere where snacks are free and friends break for coffee at three
en.CREDITS_THEME_6: If you’ve got a bachelor’s degree…
en.CREDITS_THEME_9: Oh you need a job job
en.CREDITS_THEME_11: Ooh get you a job job
en.CREDITS_THEME_12: You need a job job, it’s true
en.CREDITS_THEME_13: Well have I got a job job for you…
en.CREDITS_THEME_14: We’ve got perks like a dental plan
en.CREDITS_THEME_15: And once a week it’s okay to wear jeans
en.CREDITS_THEME_16: Plastics go in the recycling can, ooh
en.CREDITS_THEME_18: You’ve got vacation days, but why would you want time away?
en.CREDITS_THEME_20: When you do what you love, why not do it every day?
en.CREDITS_THEME_26: Oh get you a job job
en.CREDITS_THEME_28: Oh who wants a job job?
en.CREDITS_THEME_29: You need, oh yes you really need...
en.CREDITS_THEME_32: If (if if if) you give to we
en.CREDITS_THEME_36: Oh you need a job job
en.CREDITS_THEME_38: Ooh get you a job job
en.CREDITS_THEME_39: You need a job job, it’s true
en.CREDITS_THEME_40: Well have I got a job job for you…
